comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: In the preliminaries to the 1962 'one man one vote' electon there was a certain amount of violence and intimidation by local UNIP Youth Brigades - especially in hard line UNIP areas like the Northern Province.  There were fights between rival factions and the burning of schools (especially those run by Jehova's wirnesses who refused to have anything to do with politics). This is one of the caches of weopons found.
